title: Samosa  Recipe Card
main_ingredients: Whole wheat flour (atta) (आटा),  Raw bananas (कच्चे केले)

title: Salted Caramel Cheesecake Recipe Card
description: 'Cheesecake made tastier with salted caramel.These super tasty Salted Caramel Cheesecake bites are great for parties and all occasions really!! Creamy cheesecake recipe topped with sticky caramel, pecans, and a sprinkle of sea salt.'
method: To make salted caramel, heat sugar in a non-stick pan and let it caramelize. Add cream and butter, mix and cook till the butter melts. Add sea salt and mix well. Remove from heat and set aside.
Preheat oven to 180º C.
Take the crushed biscuits in a bowl. Reserve 1 tablespoon salted caramel, add remaining and mix well. Spread the mixture in a 5 inch loose bottom baking tin evenly to make the crust. Set aside.
Separate egg yolks from whites and put into two different bowls.
Cream together cream cheese, hung yogurt and castor sugar in a third bowl till smooth.
Lightly beat egg yolks, add to the cheese-sugar mixture and mix well.
Add lemon juice and vanilla essence and mix well. Add reserved salted caramel and coffee powder and mix well.
Beat egg whites with a hand blender till soft peaks are formed. Fold this into the cream cheese mixture.
Pour the mixture over the crust lined in the baking tin and spread. Place it in the preheated oven and bake for 30 minutes. Remove from oven and cool.
Cut into wedges, drizzle caramel sauce on top, garnish with mint sprig and serve.
main_ingredients: Cream cheese (क्रीम चीज़),  Digestive biscuits (डायजेस्टिव बिस्किट  )

title: Salsa Chicken Casserole Recipe Card
description: 'This dish makes a complete meal – herbed rice topped with chicken cooked salsa style and cheese and baked.'
ingredients: Boneless chicken cut into 1 inch pieces  250 grams
method: To make herbed rice, heat butter in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and sauté for 30 seconds.
Add chilli flakes and coriander leaves, mix well and sauté for 1 minute.
Add rice and mix well. Add salt and mix well. Remove from heat and set aside.
Preheat oven to 180º C.
To make salsa chicken, heat oil in another non-stick pan. Add green chillies and sauté for 5 seconds. Add onion, mix and sauté for 30 seconds.
Add tomatoes, coriander leaves and salt, mix well and cook for 1 minute.
Add chicken, mix and cook till it is fully done. Add lemon juice and mix. Remove from heat and set aside.
Spread herbed rice in an oval glass baking dish and top with the salsa chicken. Sprinkle cheese on top, place the dish in the preheated oven and bake till the cheese melts.
Serve hot.

title: Salmon Wellington Recipe Card
description: 'A puff pastry stuffed with spinach mixture and salmon, shaped into a braid and baked.'
ingredients: Salmon fish fillets, cut into 2 inch pieces  400 grams
black sesame seeds (kale til)    to sprinkle
method: Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and sauté for 30 seconds.
Add onions, mix and sauté till translucent. Add spinach and mix well.
Add little salt and crushed peppercorns, mix well and transfer onto a plate.
Add feta cheese and mix well.
Place the fish pieces on a plate. Add salt, lemon juice and dill and rub well. Set aside for 10 minutes.
Dust the worktop with some flour. Place a portion of the dough on it and roll out into a ½ inch thick sheet. Fold in all the edges, dust with some flour and roll out again into a thin sheet.
Make a bed of the spinach mixture in the centre, place a fish piece on it and discard the uneven edges.
Preheat oven at 180° C.

Make cuts on the opposite lengthwise sides. Brush with some beaten eggs and bring in the strips over the fish to cover it, making a braid pattern. Seal the edges. Similarly, prepare the remaining wellingtons.
Place the wellingtons on a baking tray and brush with the beaten eggs. Sprinkle black and white sesame seeds on top, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.
Serve hot.

title: Salmon Mousse in Parmesan Tacos Recipe Card
description: 'Delicate salmon mousse served in tacos made out of grated parmesan cheese.'
ingredients: Salmon tinned smoked, cut into cubes  100 grams
Cucumber peeled and cut into small cubes  1 small
Avocado peeled and chopped  ½ small
method: Blend together fish, cream and cream cheese into a smooth mixture. Transfer into a bowl.
Add salt, crushed peppercorns and dill and mix well.
Take cucumber, avocado, spring onion greens, capers, lemon segments, salt, crushed peppercorns and olive oil in a bowl and mix well. Add cherry tomatoes and mix.
Heat a non-stick tawa. Place a cookie cutter on it, sprinkle spoonful of parmesan in it leaving gaps in between. Sprinkle onion seeds on them and roast till crisp.
Immediately remove from heat, place a rolling in the centre and turn to give the shape of tacos.
Fill the tacos with the salmon mousse and top with the cucumber mixture.
Serve immediately.

title: Sangria Popsicles Recipe Card
description: 'The much liked ladies drink frozen and served as popsicles.'
method: Heat red wine in a non-stick pan. Add castor sugar, mix and cook till it melts.
Put some strawberries in a popsicle mould tray.
Remove pan from heat, add torn mint sprigs and mix. Add pomegranate juice and mix.
Pour the mixture into the popsicle mould tray, cover and freeze for 5-6 hours.
Demould and serve immediately.
main_ingredients: Red wine (रेड वाइन),  Castor sugar (caster sugar) (कैस्टर शुगर / बारीक चीनी)

title: Salami Pinwheel Recipe Card
description: 'Quick to make yet extremely tasty â€“ these pinwheels are absolute winners.'
method: Place tortillas on a worktop. Spread 1 tablespoon mayonnaise on each and put 6 salamis on one side of each.
Top with some lettuce, onion, spring onion greens and olives. Sprinkle salt, crushed peppercorns, mixed herbs and cheese and roll tightly.
Cut into round slices and serve immediately.
main_ingredients: Chicken salami (चिकन सालामी),  Refined flour tortillas (मैदे के तौरतिया)

title: Rusk Recipe Card
description: 'Enjoy these rusks with cups of hot tea.'
method: Take yeast in a bowl. Add a pinch castor sugar and 2 tablespoons warm water, mix and set aside to activate.
Take flour in another bowl. Add ¼ cup castor sugar and salt and mix. Make a well in the center, add activated yeast and whisk well with an electric beater.
Add olive oil and whisk to form a soft dough. Cover with cling film and set aside to prove for 15-20 minutes.
Grease a baking tin with some butter and dust with some flour.
Transfer the dough onto worktop and knock back to release excess air.
Transfer the dough into the greased baking tin and level it out. Cover with cling film and set aside to prove for 15-20 minutes.
Preheat oven to 180° C.
Brush some milk on top. Place the tin in the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes. Remove from oven, cool and demould.
Slice and bake again at 120° C for at least for 30 minutes. Serve.
main_ingredients: Refined flour (maida) (मैदा),  Fresh yeast (ताज़ी यीस्ट/ ख़मीर )

title: Rum and Raisin Cheesecake Recipe Card
description: 'Rum and raisins make a great combination, which give this cheesecake an exclusive taste.'
method: Take raisins in another bowl. Add rum, mix and set aside for 30 minutes.
Take biscuits in a plastic zip-lock bag, seal and crush them with a rolling pin. Transfer into a bowl.
Add 2 tablespoons castor sugar and melted butter and mix well.
To prepare cheese cake mixture, take cream cheese in a third bowl. Add ¼ cup castor sugar and whisk with an electric beater. Add coffee decoction and whisk well.Add rum and raisin mixture and mix.
Put ½ the cream cheese mixture into another bowl. Add ½ the whipped cream and fold in. Add to remaining cream cheese mixture along with remaining whipped cream and fold in well.
Fill a piping bag fitted with a medium star nozzle with the cream mixture. Line individual shot glasses with biscuit-butter mixture and pipe out cream mixture over them.
Chill and serve.

title: Roasted Cherry Tomato and Guacamole Sandwich Recipe Card
description: 'These sandwiches are simply yummy with the goodness of guacamole and flavour of roasted cherry tomatoes.'
ingredients: Avocado seeded, flesh scooped out and mashed  1
method: Preheat oven to200º C. Line a baking tray with a silicon mat.
Halve cherry tomatoes and spread them in the baking tray. Drizzle some oil and sprinkle some crushed peppercorns and salt on top. Put some torn rosemary sprigs.
Place the baking tray in preheated oven and roast for 10 minutes.
To prepare guacamole, take avocado flesh in a bowl. Add tomato, onion, green chillies, coriander leaves, lemon juice, salt and crushed peppercorns and mix well.
Spread some feta cheese and guacamole on each bread slice. Put some roasted cherry tomatoes on top.
Serve immediately.

title: Rice Stuffed Omelette Recipe Card
description: 'Simple egg omelette made special stuffed with a spicy rice and chicken mixture.'
ingredients: Chicken sausages cut into small cubes  4-5
method: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and sauté for 10 seconds. Add onion and sauté till translucent.
Add tomato puree, mix and cook for 1minute. Add sausages, mix and cook for 1minute. Add tomato ketchup and mix. Add rice, fresh thyme, salt, crushed peppercorns, mix and cook for 1 minute.
Break eggs into a bowl. Add milk, crushed peppercorns and salt and whisk well.

Heat some oil in another non-stick pan. Pour a quarter of the egg mixture, mix lightly and cook till the omelette is set. Put some rice mixture on one side of the omelette and fold the other side over it. Similarly make more omelettes.
Halve each and serve hot.

title: Rice Noodle Fritters Recipe Card
description: 'Crisp and flavourful, these rice noodle fritters will make you proud when you serve them at your next party.'
ingredients: Fennel seeds (saunf) roasted and crushed  1 teaspoon
Cumin seeds roasted and crushed  1 teaspoon
method: Take vermicelli in a bowl. Add warm water, cover with cling film and keep till vermicelli softens.
Heat sufficient oil in a pan.
Strain the soaked vermicelli into a bowl and chop roughly.
Add red chillies, crushed fennel seeds, crushed cumin seeds, crushed peppercorns, onion and salt and mix. Add egg white and mix well.
Put spoonful of vermicelli mixture directly into hot oil and deep-fry till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.
Serve hot with sweet chilli sauce.

title: Red Velvet Cheese Cake Brownie Recipe Card
description: 'An exciting mixture of cheese cake and brownie – what more can one ask for to celebrate a special occasions.'
method: Preheat oven to 180º C. Grease an 8-inch baking tin with some butter and dust with some flour.
Cream together butter and 1 cup castor sugar in a bowl with an electric beater.Add cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon vanilla essence, cochineal and salt and whisk. Add vinegar and whisk well.
Break in eggs and whisk. Add flour and whisk well. Transfer ¾ of batter into the greased baking tin,reserving the remaining,and level it out.
Take cream cheese in another bowl. Add 3 tablespoons castor sugar, remaining vanilla essence and egg yolk and whisk with an electric beater.
Put the cream cheese mixture on top of the batter and level it out. Spread remaining batter on top.
Place the tin on the baking tray. Place the baking tray in the preheated oven and bake for 25-30 minutes. Remove from oven, cool and demould.
Serve.

title: Red Velvet Cake with Coconut Pecan Frosting Recipe Card
description: 'Layers of red velvet cake and coconut pecan frosting arranged in wine glasses and served.'
method: Preheat oven to 180° C. Grease a baking tin with some butter and dust with some flour.
Cream together butter, castor sugar and vanilla essence in a bowl with an electric beater. Break eggs and add and whisk well. Add beetroot juice and whisk well.
Sieve together flour and baking powder into the bowl and whisk. Add buttermilk and whisk well. Transfer the batter into the greased tin and tap lightly.
Place the tin in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes. Remove from oven and cool.
To prepare coconut pecan frosting, cream together butter and icing sugar in another bowl with an electric beater.
Add pecan and whisk. Add desiccated coconut and whisk. Add milk and whisk well.
Fill a piping bag with this frosting.
Demould the cake and cut horizontally into 3 equal slices. Further cut roundels with a medium sized cookie cutter. Crumble the remaining cake.
Line individual wine glass with one cake roundel. Pipe out frosting and repeat these layers twice. Put some desiccated coconut and some cake crumbs on top.
Serve immediately.
main_ingredients: Beetroot juice (चुकन्दर का रस),  Refined flour (maida) (मैदा)

title: Red Slaw Sandwich Recipe Card
description: 'Bursting with flavour and nutrients, enjoy this sandwich without feeling guilty.'
ingredients: Apple cut into thin strips  1 medium
Red capsicum cut into thin strips  ½ medium
Red radish cut into thin strips  1
method: Halve baguette vertically and cut each half horizontally into two.
Take apple, red cabbage, iceberg lettuce, red capsicum, red radish, grain mustard, mayonnaise, salt and crushed peppercorns in a bowl and mix well.
Put some apple-cabbage mixture on one bread slice, top with some alfalfa and cover with another slice. Similarly prepare the other sandwich.
Serve immediately.

title: Quinoa Pulao with Mixed Vegetables Recipe Card
description: 'Quinoa mixed vegetable pulao served differently.'
ingredients: Carrot peeled, cut into diamonds and blanched  1 medium
baby corn cut into diamonds and blanched  6-8
Broccoli florets separated and blanched  1 small head
method: Heat 1 tablespoon ghee in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds, peppercorns and cloves and sauté till fragrant. Add quinoa, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Add yogurt and mix. Add salt, mix and cook on high heat for 3-4 minutes or till mixture dries.
Add 3 cups water, mix and bring to boil. Cover and cook till quinoa is done.
Heat remaining ghee in another non-stick pan. Add carrot, baby corn and broccoli, toss and cook for 1 minute.

Place a medium size cookie cutter in the center of a serving platter. Put cooked quinoa into the cookie cutter and place sautéed vegetables and micro greens on top. Remove the cookie cutter carefully.
Serve hot.

title: Quinoa Pistachio Bars Recipe Card
description: 'A healthy and extremely tasty bar that can be enjoyed by both young and old.'
ingredients: Pistachios roasted and crushed  ¼ cup
method: Coarsely grind dates in a food processor and transfer into a bowl.
Add honey, pistachios, quinoa, chocolate chips and mix. Add salt and mix well.
Grease a barfi tray with some oil, transfer the date-quinoa mixture into it and level it out. Refrigerate for 1 hour.
Cut into 1 inch thick pieces and demould. Serve.

title: Quinoa Chicken Nuggets Recipe Card
description: 'Crunchy on the outside and luscious inside, these boneless chicken pieces make fabulous starters.'
ingredients: Boneless chicken cut into 1½-2 inch pieces  250 grams
method: Heat sufficient oil in a pan.
Take flour, salt and crushed peppercorns in a bowl and mix.
Break eggs in another bowl and whisk. Take quinoa in a third bowl.
Dip chicken pieces in egg mixture, coat with flour mixture and dip again in egg mixture. Finally coat the pieces with quinoa.
Deep-fry these chicken pieces in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.
Serve hot with tomato ketchup.

title: Quick Garlic Spaghetti Recipe Card
description: 'When you have a sudden urge to have spaghetti then make this dish – it is quick to make and extremely tasty. A fast and easy recipe for spaghetti tossed in a sautéed mushroom, garlic, and butter sauce. Quick & Easy Butter Garlic Noodles. All you need is a pound of pasta, butter, garlic, salt, pepper and cheese.  '
ingredients: Parmesan cheese grated 2 tablespoons +   for garnishing
method: Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan. Add garlic and sauté till light golden.
Add vegetable stock and salt and mix. Add spaghetti and toss to mix.
Add parsley and parmesan cheese, mix and cook for 1 minute.
Serve hot garnished with some parmesan cheese.

title: Puri Bhaji Spring Roll Recipe Card
description: 'Potato bhaji rolled in puris and deep-fried to make a Indian style spring roll. Vegetables Spring rolls are always a hit especially with the kids. So, this recipe of vegetable spring rolls from scratch is just perfect for you.'
ingredients: Whole wheat flour (atta) dough    as required
Potatoes boiled, peeled and mashed  3-4 medium
Oil 1 tablespoon + foe greasing   + deep frying
method: Heat oil in a non-stick pan. Add curry leaves, mustard seeds and cumin seeds and let mustard seeds splutter. Add green chillies and turmeric powder and sauté for 30 seconds.
Add potatoes, mix and cook for 1 minute. Add salt and mix. Add coriander leaves and mix well. Remove from heat and cool.
Divide the dough into equal portions and shape them into balls.
Grease the worktop with some oil, place each ball and roll out to a thin disc.
Divide the potato mixture into equal portions and put a portion of potato mixture in the centre of each disc, fold in the four sides and roll.
Heat sufficient oil in a kadai. Deep-fry each spring roll in hot oil till golden and crisp. Drain on absorbent paper.
Serve hot.
main_ingredients: Whole wheat flour (atta) dough (गूंदा हुआ आटा),  Potatoes (आलू)

title: Pull Apart Sausage and Cheese Bread Recipe Card
description: 'Most unusual, wholesome and delectable snack ever.'
ingredients: Mozzarella cheese cut into small thick slices  80 grams
method: Preheat oven to180º C.
Make criss-cross incisions on the bread without cutting through. Insert mozzarella cheese slices and sausage slices alternatively into the cut spaces. Place the breadon a baking tray.
Take butter in a bowl. Add garlic, parsley, chilli flakes, salt and mix well.
Drizzle the prepared herb-garlic butter on the bread, cover with an aluminium foil, place the tray in the preheated oven and bake till cheese melts.
Serve immediately.
main_ingredients: Chicken sausages (चिकन सौसेज़),  Mozzarella cheese (मोज़ारेला चीज़)
